vista.graph
Class TimeTickGenerator

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.TimeTickGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
TickGenerator
public class TimeTickGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements TickGenerator

Generates information for tick placement and their associated labels using a range of given maximum and minimum. This now includes better labeling for days to month tick transitions.

Version:
$Id: TimeTickGenerator.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:11 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
